name: repo-description
description: AI-powered CLI that automatically generates clear, natural-language descriptions of every file in a repository.
author: Ion Gireada

scripts.describe: node src/cli.js . descriptions.json && node src/cli.js . descriptions.md --format markdown && node src/cli.js . descriptions-table.md --format markdown --table && node src/cli.js . descriptions-summary.md --format markdown --summary && node src/cli.js . descriptions-table-summary.md --format markdown --table --summary
scripts.prep: npm run docs && npm run lint:fix && npm run format

scriptsMeta.test: Runs the test suite using Jest.
scriptsMeta.describe: Generates AI-powered descriptions for repository files and outputs them in various formats.
scriptsMeta.lint: Lints the codebase for potential errors and style violations.
scriptsMeta.lint:fix: Lints the codebase and automatically fixes fixable issues.
scriptsMeta.prep: Prepares the codebase by generating documentation, linting, and formatting.
scriptsMeta.docs: Generates documentation by processing Markdown files with markdown-magic.
